tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BillableHours (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name STRING,
    client_name STRING,
    hours_worked DECIMAL,
    hourly_rate DECIMAL,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name STRING,
    expense_type STRING,
    amount DECIMAL,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE billable_hours (
billable_hours_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
client_id INT,
hours_worked DECIMAL,
rate DECIMAL,
start_time TIMESTAMP,
end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
client_id INT,
amount DECIMAL,
description TEXT,
expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
client_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
client_name VARCHAR(255),
contact_person VARCHAR(255),
contact_email VARCHAR(255),
contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE client (
	client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE lawyer (
	lawyer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	lawyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	rate_per_hour DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE time_entry (
	entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	lawyer_id INT NOT NULL,
	client_id INT NOT NULL,
	date DATE NOT NULL,
	hours_worked DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE expense (
	expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT NOT NULL,
	date DATE NOT NULL,
	amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE legal_matters (
    matter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    matter_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE time_entries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    matter_id INT,
    date DATE,
    hours_worked FLOAT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    matter_id INT,
    date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
);
